title: STAN Stock: Standard Chartered Plc Announces Share Buyback
summary: The bank reported fourthquarter profits that exceeded analysts expectations and announced a new 1 billion buyback However these cost savings will be partially offset by costs related to organizational changes Standard Chartered reported a 63 increase in fourthquarter adjusted pretax profit and it plans to raise its fullyear dividend by 50 Options being considered include separating the investment bank from corporate and commercial banking operations which may lead to job cuts Here are some of the investing ideas that can be explored using this information
